com.icodici.universa.node2.network

Class UDPAdapter.Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Block
  • Enclosing class:
    UDPAdapter

    public class UDPAdapter.Block
extends java.lang.Object
    Block is structure for sending between sessions (in other words between remotes parties). Block consists from UDPAdapter.Packet. Think about block as middle-level structure. Block has set of packets, own id, own type, receiver's info and some other control fields.
